a00ef583-2b6b-442e-8e8b-dad3992a0530.description: Earners of this badge have completed Makeen Advisors' "Storylining and Communication" course. In this course, participants learn effective communication techniques using the Minto Pyramid Principles in skills as well as effective content production and visualization skills. Upon completion, participants gain the skills and knowledge needed to craft compelling narratives and communicate their ideas effectively.
a00ef583-2b6b-442e-8e8b-dad3992a0530.name: Storylining and Communication

badge_template_activities.title: The "Storylining and Communication" course is a 2-day full-time course that provides both theoretical and practical training in written communication. This includes learning how to develop content that is clear and compelling, structure information in a logical and effective way, and use appropriate style. The course has a particular focus on the Minto Pyramid Principle, a widely-used framework for organizing information in a clear and concise manner.

da36acae-c229-42ce-b563-bdc4af5cd908.description: Earners of this badge have completed Makeen Advisors' "Structured Problem Solving" course. In this course, participants learn how to use a structured approach to improve their problem-solving skills, articulate clear problem statements, learn how to use an issue tree to identify and prioritize problems, and increase their work productivity through effective analysis and prioritization. Upon completion, participants gain the skills and knowledge needed to tackle complex problems with confidence.
da36acae-c229-42ce-b563-bdc4af5cd908.name: Structured Problem Solving

badge_template_activities.title: The "Structured Problem Solving" is a 2-day full-time course that provides both theoretical and practical training in structured problem-solving. This includes learning how to define problems, disaggregate them into smaller, more manageable parts, prioritize issues for analysis, and conduct effective analysis to find solutions. The course is designed to give participants a comprehensive understanding of the structured problem-solving process and the skills needed to apply it in practice.

37403bc3-c503-4c55-a91f-423f6e1db9f5.description: Earners of this badge have completed Makeen Advisors’ “Managing Stakeholders” learning course. In this course, participants understand the motivations and objectives of stakeholders, improve their ability to respond to difficult or uncommon situations, and build long-term relationships with stakeholders which lead to stakeholder satisfaction. Upon completion, they will have gained the skills and knowledge needed to effectively manage stakeholders and achieve successful outcomes.
37403bc3-c503-4c55-a91f-423f6e1db9f5.name: Managing Stakeholders

badge_template_activities.title: The “Managing Stakeholders” course is a 1-day full-time course that covers the essential skills and knowledge needed to effectively manage stakeholders. This includes understanding the motivations and objectives of different stakeholders, preparing for and conducting successful meetings, and handling difficult situations with clients.

52054bd3-6eff-4017-a233-6e6d6024c341.description: Earners of this badge have completed Makeen Advisors’ “Research and Benchmarking” learning course. In this course, participants develop the skills needed to scope and plan research and benchmarking projects, identify, assess, and access relevant data sources, and improve their work products and final deliverables. Upon completion, they will be proficient in conducting research and collecting data to support their work and make informed decisions.
52054bd3-6eff-4017-a233-6e6d6024c341.name: Research and Benchmarking

badge_template_activities.title: The “Research and Benchmarking” is a 2-day full-time course that provides both theoretical and practical training s on how to scope research projects, identify and evaluate relevant data sources, extract insights from data, and develop coherent reports.

bbde966d-568b-46f3-900a-f2284b87827a.description: Earners of this badge have completed Makeen Advisors’ “Working in Teams” course. In this course, participants learn how to improve individual and team productivity and wellbeing, increase team effectiveness, and better understand their own and others’ style and work preferences. Upon completion, participants gain the skills and knowledge needed to work effectively in a team setting and contribute to the success of their team.
bbde966d-568b-46f3-900a-f2284b87827a.name: Working in Teams

badge_template_activities.title: The “Working in Teams” is a 1-day full-time course that covers the essential skills and knowledge needed to work effectively in a team setting. This includes establishing team norms, staying productive, providing and receiving feedback, and conducting team health checks. The course also covers the use of the MBTI Personality types framework as a tool for understanding and working with different personality types within a team.
